query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as count
         FROM alertas_gafetes ag
         WHERE ag.gafete_numero = ? AND ag.resuelto = 0
         AND (
            ( ? = 'proveedor' AND ag.ingreso_proveedor_id IS NOT NULL )
            OR
            ( ? = 'contratista' AND ag.ingreso_contratista_id IS NOT NULL )
         )
